statement_text: Yeah, well, unpasteurized milk and cheeses I would surely avoid. But I’ve been saying that [avoiding unpasteurized milk and cheeses] for 50 years for a whole lot of other reasons, too, public-health-wise. Surely, this [H5N1 risk with milk/meat] is just one more addition to that [the list of other reasons].
